sentences.sentence: Gifts in cash as well as gifts in kind are considered gifts

The services provided free of charge or below real cost, the credit lines made available that do not have to be repaid and the services that are apparently charged by a political party, a list or a candidate above the market prices, are also considered as gifts
Only natural persons are allowed to make donations
Gifts from legal persons or de facto associations, as well as gifts from natural persons who actually act as intermediaries of legal persons or de facto associations, are prohibited
Attention
The lists may finance their election propaganda with donations of a maximum of 500 euros per donor or its equivalent

sentences.sentence: Sponsorship is understood to mean making money or products available in accordance with current market prices in exchange for publicity
Companies, de facto associations and legal persons are allowed to sponsor
A company is any natural or legal person who pursues an economic objective in a sustainable manner, as well as its associations
Attention
The lists may receive a maximum of 500 euros or its equivalent per sponsor
